content: my very own pompurin this is the first pattern that i ve made so let me know if you catch any mistakes/have any questions thank you so much for downloading this pattern and i hope you enjoy your very own pompurin tag me in photos of what you created or contact me on instagram @ atoz_mystery you are free to sell them just please give me credit *note i forgot to count what row the arms/legs/tail goes but i approximate the placement in the assembly section materials yellow yarn- i used sweet snugglestm by loops and threads in the color daffodil bulky soft yarn brown yarn- the yarn i used is medium non-fuzzy/thick and is thinner than the yellow yarn crochet hook - i used a 8 mm crochet hook for the yellow yarn and a 5 mm hook for the brown yarn stitch marker scissors tapestry needle stuffing and lots of it brown felt and fabric glue row counter may be helpful
